programme.title: A Good Year
Dobry rok
programme.desc:
A Good Year: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Freddie Highmore, Albert Finney, Russell Crowe, Rafe Spall. A British investment broker inherits his uncle's chateau and vineyard in Provence, where he spent much of his childhood. He discovers a new laid-back lifestyle as he tries to renovate the estate to be sold." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0401445/","name":"A Good Year","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE4NDY3MjUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMTMwODI3._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000128/","name":"Russell Crowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0180411/","name":"Abbie Cornish"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001215/","name":"Albert Finney"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136728/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0458884/","name":"Marc Klein"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562706/","name":"Peter Mayle"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Good Year","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1823736089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM2ZTM3ZTAtMGFkYy00OTgzLWFhMTktNzFiYjFlYTFkMmQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM2ZTM3ZTAtMGFkYy00OTgzLWFhMTktNzFiYjFlYTFkMmQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"datePublished":"2006-10-27","description":"A British investment broker inherits his uncle's chateau and vineyard in Provence, where he spent much of his childhood. He discovers a new laid-back lifestyle as he tries to renovate the estate to be sold.","keywords":"chateau,provence france,inheritance,based on novel,wine","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0401445/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"critter-26"},"dateCreated":"2006-10-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A tasty vintage","reviewBody":"A Good Year is much like Peter Mayle's other books  shortish, picturesque, sometimes mouthwatering, generally light and definitely charming.

To that end, this film does the book excellent justice and even manages to make the cinematic transition without losing or adding much in the process. (Max has however become a blend of Wall Street's Gordon Gecco and Capt. Aubrey  a cold power hungry cut-throat exterior with a bit of a romantic hedonist hiding a Depardieu-like charming buffoon locked inside.) Sir Ridley Scott makes it clear that the real star here is the Provencal countryside in all of its golden sun soaked glory. Russell is the fulcrum that moves us from one beautiful scene to the next, lightly shuffling and dancing in over-sized pajamas with a suit jacket and a tie for a belt.

And oddly, this isn't necessarily a bad thing.

As obvious as the story line is (both in the book and the film) it remains absolutely charming and Crowe's performance is an essential part of what makes it work, hammy or no. He looks great and his trust in Scott as a director allows him to simply have fun here  a nice break from all of the heavy (and often heavy handed) Oscar bait bio-pics he's pigeonholed himself into recently.

The rest of the cast is picture perfect. I've been waiting to see when Freddie Highmore would play a young Russell and he's lovely here, big eyed and gracefully gawky as young Max. He holds his own against Albert Finney's lovingly blustery Uncle Henry. Marion Cotillard is gorgeous as Fanny and also sturdy enough to hold her own against both Max and Crowe himself. Abbie Cornish is pretty and sweet and her American accent is damn near perfect. Isabelle Candelier is a colorful counterpoint to Max's stuffy British ways, but it is Didier Bourdon who nearly walks away with the picture. His is a character we haven't seen done a million times before and whose eyes hint at a story equal in richness to the Château itself. Archie Panjabi is Max's assistant, a character created for the film. As the all knowing and mischievously wicked Gemma she appears ready to run away with this picture. (And as always watch for a cameo by Ridley Scott's longtime partner Gianina Facio  I won't spoil your fun by telling you where she appears.) Again, there is nothing new or groundbreaking here. It will be compared to Under the Tuscan Sun and a long history of countless other films of this nature  an attractive woman or handsome bastard gets in touch with who they really are, gets back to basics and becomes who they were always meant to be.

Forgive me for taking this path, but the wine/film comparisons are inevitable with this one.

Like most of the films made today the fresh elements in this film come from the particular vision of the film maker, the chemistry of the cast and the way all of it can come together in a charming and palatable fashion. In other words, the blending of the key ingredient's.

It all comes down to being a matter of chemistry, craftsmanship and preference. Chemistry causes the grape to ferment and become wine. Craftmanship and experience make that wine something worth drinking. Chemistry amongst the elements of a film  story, cast and setting makes these pieces form a cohesive whole. Craftsmanship and experience make it a palatable film.

And the rest is simply a matter of taste.

Though it lacks the crisp originality of a sauvignon blanc, the hipness of a pinot grigio or the bold edginess of a Cabernet, but the elements here come together to make a film that plays pleasantly over the tongue like a decent rose  easy to sip and enjoy and given the chance could well leave you with the warm glow of a late summer afternoon.

But enough with the wine clichés! You could easily take advantage of the value of a matinée or opt to wait for DVD, though neither will do the scenery justice. This sweetly charming film will hold up equally well as a date movie, a mid week escape or something that you can take Mom to.

Worth a look.

-Roo's Reviews","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":89949,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Rocky II: Directed by Sylvester Stallone. With Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers. Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0079817/","name":"Rocky II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzZjQyMDgtMmQ3YS00ZDE4LWIyYTAtMWRkMWQ4ZTI5ZjA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwNDgzNjc@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Sport"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001735/","name":"Talia Shire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0949350/","name":"Burt Young"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054262/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Rocky II","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2087782169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI5MjQ4YmEtMGVhNC00ZTYxLWEzNTctN2YzNTJiODg1OGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI5MjQ4YmEtMGVhNC00ZTYxLWEzNTctN2YzNTJiODg1OGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Rocky II"},"datePublished":"1979-06-15","description":"Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.","keywords":"fist,left handedness,simple man,eye injury,hit in the face","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0079817/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LebowskiT1000"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent sequel","reviewBody":""Rocky II" is one of those sequels that is just as good as the original, if not better in some aspects. I can't say it's better than the original because you can't have the second film without the first one. Meaning that this film does not stand on it's own, you need the first film to understand the characters and back-stories of everything in this film. But all in all, I think "Rocky II" is slightly more enjoyable than the original "Rocky".

In all honesty, I think this film is better directed than the first film. The story seems to flow quite nicely and is slightly faster paced than the original. Not only that, but the main fight in the film is much more exciting and longer.

The acting in "Rocky II" is better as well, or at least I thought so. Sylvester Stallone does a fantastic job with his role of Rocky Balboa and really struts his stuff here. Talia Shire and Burt Young also pull off nice performances. Carl Weathers plays the character of Apollo Creed to a "T". And of course, Burgess Meredith does a fantastic job as Mickey.

This is one of those sequels that truly has the same feel as the original. Granted, it isn't as fresh as the original...but it's a re-match that can't be missed. If you liked the original "Rocky", then you definitely ought to check this one out, I don't think you'll be disappointed. I hope you like the film as much as I do. Thanks for reading,

-LebowskiT1000","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":195552,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

In theaters Jan. 31."},"datePublished":"2020-01-31","description":"A woman seeks revenge against those who orchestrated a plane crash that killed her family.","keywords":"revenge,female assassin,terrorism,female protagonist,sex scene","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7134096/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LeAvantGuardian"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Needs more Cowbell","reviewBody":"The Rhythm Section, for all intents and purposes is and functions (however poorly) as a revenge genre film. The problem with the movie lies in the fact that in spite of a meager attempt at training our would-be assassin for 8 months, she has the skills of you, the movie goer. Now imagine yourself as an international assassin. That's about how good she is. So If you think you'd enjoy seeing the beautiful Blake Lively get her ask kicked by 10 people, this is the movie for you. It's almost like reverse action. Pałac idealny
programme.desc: Directed by Nils Tavernier. With Jacques Gamblin, Laetitia Casta, Florence Thomassin, Bernard Le Coq. Cheval is a postman who travels every day along the Drôme. He meets the woman of his life, Philomena and from their union Alice was born. He then throws himself into a crazy gamble: to build her with his own hands, an incredible palace.

power,heartfelt","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0397892/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Vartiainen"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixa- I mean Disney at its finest","reviewBody":"Lets face it, the early 00s were not kind on Disney. The Renaissance was over, their loyal target audience was in college and thus not interested, Pixar was doing the whole CGI thing way better than them and all in all they seemed to have lost their touch. Until this film. Oh sure, it's still very much like something Pixar would have done and a bit missing on that Disney magic, but it's still a very good film that allowed them to get back on their feet.

And when I say it's something Pixar would have done, I mean that in a good way. Kind of. The plot features a dog, raised to believe he has genuine superpowers, suddenly being separated from his loyal owner Penny and now having to make his way back across USA to reunite with her. All the while having to learn that the world does not in fact play by his rules. Sounds like a Pixar movie, doesn't it. But then again, Pixar is a great film studio so that's not exactly an insult.

And the story and the characters are very good in their own right. Bolt, the eponymous main character, is very gruff and no-nonsense, but also delightfully naïve about the realities of the world, while Mittens, his new cat sidekick/helper/kidnap victim is pretty much the exact opposite. And then there is Rhino, a hamster trapped in a plastic ball and also one of Bolt's biggest fans. Rhino is awesome.

And yeah, it's kind of silly that I keep complaining about the fact that it's so much a Pixar film. It does make it seem a bit artificial in a way, because you know that they're copying much of their good material. But it's a good film, when all is said and done. Do see it, if you have the chance, is what I'm saying.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":193995,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

I mean Disney at its finest","reviewBody":"Lets face it, the early 00s were not kind on Disney. The Renaissance was over, their loyal target audience was in college and thus not interested, Pixar was doing the whole CGI thing way better than them and all in all they seemed to have lost their touch. Until this film. Oh sure, it's still very much like something Pixar would have done and a bit missing on that Disney magic, but it's still a very good film that allowed them to get back on their feet.

And when I say it's something Pixar would have done, I mean that in a good way. Kind of. The plot features a dog, raised to believe he has genuine superpowers, suddenly being separated from his loyal owner Penny and now having to make his way back across USA to reunite with her. All the while having to learn that the world does not in fact play by his rules. Sounds like a Pixar movie, doesn't it. But then again, Pixar is a great film studio so that's not exactly an insult.

And the story and the characters are very good in their own right. Bolt, the eponymous main character, is very gruff and no-nonsense, but also delightfully naïve about the realities of the world, while Mittens, his new cat sidekick/helper/kidnap victim is pretty much the exact opposite. And then there is Rhino, a hamster trapped in a plastic ball and also one of Bolt's biggest fans. Rhino is awesome.

And yeah, it's kind of silly that I keep complaining about the fact that it's so much a Pixar film. movie reminds me story of me and my father, before he died on cancer","reviewBody":"My father was a brilliant sculptor and a great visionary. When I was a kid, I never could explain what he was doing. I got it a month before his death when i was 26. This film filled my eyes with tears, because it reminded me him. he had a lot of ideas and brilliant and original ideas for improving the world, but for all his life he could not sell it to anyone, because those ideas filled his whole day. Literally. His whole apartment was filled with papers. Thank you for this movie. Thank you for the message. I would add a note that when we dream, we are escaping from the world of facts and truths. When my father said that if you think of anything in life, you have to write it down because what comes to your mind it never comes again it changed my life. Now I'm writing a book - a novel from environment of Mesopotamia and that just because my father was someone who believed in imagination and creative values​​.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":420328,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="

(C) 2015 Westbury Road Entertainment, LLC."},"datePublished":"2015-03-25","description":"An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference.","keywords":"mother daughter relationship,alien,human,friendship,interspecies friendship","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2224026/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"giofls"},"dateCreated":"2015-04-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"OK, but disappointed","reviewBody":"Took my 8-year-old girls. It was cute. They enjoyed it well enough.

But on the car ride home, when I asked about their favorite part, the best they could come up with was the cow joke (I won't repeat it).

After all the great animated kid's movies of the last 10 years (Nemo, Shrek, Cars, Frozen, etc), this one is completely forgettable. In a month or two, my girls won't even remember it. Can't imagine they'll ever ask to get a DVD or watch it at home.

I'm not sorry I took them, nor was it a waste of money. scene,oceanographer","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0362270/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tua05089"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"GREAT Flick","reviewBody":"Listen, it isn't the most artsy film on earth. It doesn't have the richest plot ever. What it has is Bill Murray and Owen Wilson teaming up with Wes Anderson to portray a wonderful story. To like any of those three involved is to like this film. Definitely worth 2 hours out of any life, unless you'll be dying in less than 2 hours. This movie signifies the new way of storytelling for movies to come for years. The days of the old-fashioned drama starring a powerful actor, supported by wonderful character actors is over. To be a good movie anymore, the lead must have the capability to play more than himself in real life (i.e. Bruce Willis is always Bruce Willis). Bill Murray fits the mold perfectly, as he portrays the washed-up sea adventurer. Not to mention the wonderful cast around him, the best performance coming possibly from Willem Dafoe (who is great in every movie he's in)."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":183396,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Covid: nowojorska kronika
programme.desc: Pięciu młodych filmowców, mieszkańców Nowego Jorku pomiędzy 17. a 21. rokiem życia, decyduje się opowiedzieć o życiu swoich rodzin dotkniętych pierwszą falą pandemii wirusa COVID-19. Za pomocą kamer rejestrują codzienne zmagania i strach przed niepewnym jutrem. W ten sposób powstaje kameralny, a przy tym głęboko osobisty obraz ukazujący trudną sytuację zwykłych ludzi, będących jednocześnie kluczowymi dla funkcjonowania państwa pracownikami, na początku kryzysu wywołanego koronawirusem w kraju rozdartym nierównościami społecznymi. W produkcji wykorzystano oryginalne animacje Rosemary Colón-Martinez.

programme.desc:

"},"datePublished":"2012-12-26","description":"A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.","keywords":"pittsburgh pennsylvania,sniper,coma,quarry,heads knocked together","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0790724/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dave-n-pounds"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fast and clever","reviewBody":"After putting off watching this film as I usually don't enjoy Tom Cruise I was pleasantly surprised. The film has a good twisting plot and Jack Reacher is a mix between James Bond and John McLane from Die Hard. There are some memorable characters and the film draws you in and makes you think. The plot is easy to follow but complex enough to keep you interested without giving you brain ache. In short I liked Jack Reacher and look forward to more films with Jack. 

The plot has plenty of fast action scenes which are thankfully not too over the top and keep the pace of the film going. The ending was also well thought out despite the slightly cheesy last few lines. But they do leave the character ready for follow up films.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":314755,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Rock & Roll Hall of Fame - ceremonia
Jestem numerem cztery
programme.desc: John Smith niczym się nie wyróżnia na tle innych nastolatków mieszkających w prowincjonalnym miasteczku w stanie Ohio. W rzeczywistości jest on jednak jednym z dziewięciu uciekinierów z planety Lorien, którzy ukryli się na Ziemi, gdy ich rodzimymi terenami zawładnęli przedstawiciele wrogiej rasy. Chłopak nie zdaje sobie sprawy, że wciąż grozi mu niebezpieczeństwo. Uczy się w lokalnym liceum i zakochuje się w szkolnej piękności Sarah. Wspólne plany burzy nagłe pojawienie się okrutnych prześladowców z Lorien. Zabili oni już trzech zbiegów. Następny w kolejności jest John. By ocalić siebie i ukochaną, nastolatek musi stanąć do walki z wrogami. Może ich pokonać tylko w jeden sposób - używając swoich nadprzyrodzonych sił i jednocząc się z pozostałymi uchodźcami. Niczym anioł stróż czuwa nad nim Henri, który pomaga mu lepiej rozumieć samego siebie i kontrolować moce takie jak telekineza. Pochodząca z tej samej planety dziewczyna z numerem sześć potrafi natomiast znikać i zaskakiwać wroga, pojawiając się znienacka. Atuty te mogą jednak okazać się niewystarczające w starciu z potęgą prześladowcy.

programme.desc:
Saw: With Earl Alexander, Jen Taylor, Troy Lund, Khanh Doan. Jigsaw has killed your partner and destroyed your life. Now he has trapped you in an abandoned insane asylum that he alone controls. If you can defeat his brutal traps and survive, you may just discover the truth behind what drives this twisted serial killer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"VideoGame","url":"/title/tt1144553/","name":"Saw","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzEyYjY2YmItOWFmYi00ZTIzLTkyZmEtNGRkNjU0ZGY3YmQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTEwNDY2MjU@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"M","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1591093/","name":"Earl Alexander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1071768/","name":"Jen Taylor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0526252/","name":"Troy Lund"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0207809/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0267854/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1490123/","name":"James Wan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1191481/","name":"Leigh Whannell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6948759/","name":"John Williamson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Saw","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2556083481","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGVkMGEyNjUtODMzOS00YTY3LTk2YzctM2Q2NjFjOGMwZmNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGVkMGEyNjUtODMzOS00YTY3LTk2YzctM2Q2NjFjOGMwZmNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Saw"},"datePublished":"2009-10-06","description":"Jigsaw has killed your partner and destroyed your life. Now he has trapped you in an abandoned insane asylum that he alone controls. If you can defeat his brutal traps and survive, you may just discover the truth behind what drives t","keywords":"single player,playstation 3,survival horror,xbox 360,microsoft windows","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1144553/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Roadwarrior85846"},"dateCreated":"2009-10-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not a bad game but could've been better.","reviewBody":"SAW: The Game is survival horror video game based off the SAW franchise. As a big fan of the SAW series, the storyline and plot were pretty well written but the rest of the game was just a bit sloppy.

You play as Detective Tapp from the first SAW film. We all thought he died in the movie by Zep shooting him near the end of the film but we were all wrong. Jigsaw kidnaps him and saves his life. Jigsaw told Detective Tapp that after taking the bullet out of his body, he put in a key in him. This key is a way out of where Tapp and other Jigsaw's victims were currently in which is an abandon asylum. As Detective Tapp, your mission is to survive from maniacs that wants to kill you for the key, survive from Jigsaw's traps, rescuing important characters of the story, solve multiple puzzles, and try to crack the case on who is Jigsaw.

The game's story is pretty cool. You kind of get to know more a little of Jigsaw, witness characters from other SAW films and some just made for the game, and you actually make your own choice at the end of what you really want after what you experienced through the twisted world of the game. Those are the good things about the game.

The bad things about the game is mostly the graphics. The graphics of the Xbox360 version is got to be the worst graphics I've ever seen in this console. There's a handful of glitches and the smoothing texture is very delayed if you start from a checkpoint or skipping a cut-scene. The voice acting is a little bit strange. The only voice acting that is really good is Tobin Bell's work (Jigsaw). Everybody else felt like they're amateurs in acting. The controls are a bit strange as well. Later on in the game, you can make explosive traps with household products. You have them equipped but I haven't had a clue on how to plant the trap on the ground until near the end of the game that I can just simply press RT while equipped. It's like you have dementia and you have to figure it out yourself on how to use the controls in the game. If I were the makers of this game, I could have continue working and tweaking things up and plant the release date a month after SAW VI's release date.

Overall, decent game but sloppy. You just have to get use to it. It's a must-have for SAW fans but for regular horror or video game buffs, It's safe to skip this one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":711,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8}}</script><metacontent="

If you can defeat his brutal traps and survive, you may just discover the truth behind what drives t","keywords":"single player,playstation 3,survival horror,xbox 360,microsoft windows","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1144553/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Roadwarrior85846","dateCreated":"2009-10-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not a bad game but could've been better.","reviewBody":"SAW: The Game is survival horror video game based off the SAW franchise. As a big fan of the SAW series, the storyline and plot were pretty well written but the rest of the game was just a bit sloppy.

You play as Detective Tapp from the first SAW film. We all thought he died in the movie by Zep shooting him near the end of the film but we were all wrong. Jigsaw kidnaps him and saves his life. Jigsaw told Detective Tapp that after taking the bullet out of his body, he put in a key in him. This key is a way out of where Tapp and other Jigsaw's victims were currently in which is an abandon asylum. As Detective Tapp, your mission is to survive from maniacs that wants to kill you for the key, survive from Jigsaw's traps, rescuing important characters of the story, solve multiple puzzles, and try to crack the case on who is Jigsaw.

The game's story is pretty cool. You kind of get to know more a little of Jigsaw, witness characters from other SAW films and some just made for the game, and you actually make your own choice at the end of what you really want after what you experienced through the twisted world of the game. Those are the good things about the game.

The bad things about the game is mostly the graphics. The graphics of the Xbox360 version is got to be the worst graphics I've ever seen in this console. There's a handful of glitches and the smoothing texture is very delayed if you start from a checkpoint or skipping a cut-scene. The voice acting is a little bit strange. The only voice acting that is really good is Tobin Bell's work (Jigsaw). Everybody else felt like they're amateurs in acting. The controls are a bit strange as well. Later on in the game, you can make explosive traps with household products. You have them equipped but I haven't had a clue on how to plant the trap on the ground until near the end of the game that I can just simply press RT while equipped. It's like you have dementia and you have to figure it out yourself on how to use the controls in the game. If I were the makers of this game, I could have continue working and tweaking things up and plant the release date a month after SAW VI's release date.

Overall, decent game but sloppy. You just have to get use to it. It's a must-have for SAW fans but for regular horror or video game buffs, It's safe to skip this one.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":711,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8</script><metacontent="

Desperate to uncover the truth, Banning turns to unlikely allies to help clear his name, keep his family from harm and save the country from imminent danger."},"datePublished":"2019-08-23","description":"Mike Banning is framed for the attempted assassination of the President and must evade his own agency and the FBI as he tries to uncover the real threat.","keywords":"secret service agent,one against many,conspiracy,fugitive,sequel","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6189022/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ssjsolidsnake"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good popcorn action flick","reviewBody":"If you enjoyed the previous 2 movies, this movie follows the same simple formula but it's a very nice 3rd movie. programme.title: Pan T
Pan T.
programme.desc: Pan T.: Directed by Marcin Krzysztalowicz. With Pawel Wilczak, Sebastian Stankiewicz, Maria Sobocinska, Jerzy Bonczak. Anything is possible in Warsaw rising from the war rubble in 1953. The omnipresent uncertainty, denunciations, and the sense of constant surveillance are tamed with the help of vodka and good company. A renowned writer, Mister T. lives in a hotel for authors and makes a living by giving extra lessons. One day, a young countryside man moves into the next-door flat with big dreams of working as a journalist. Mister T. becomes his mentor and teacher. The pace of the protagonist's life quickens once the authorities begin to suspect him of an evil wish to blow up the Palace of Culture and Science, and Secret Police agents start to watch every move he makes. IMDb data; ttnr: 9856606, Title: Pan T, --- Description: Pan T.: Directed by Marcin Krzysztalowicz. With Pawel Wilczak, Sebastian Stankiewicz, Maria Sobocinska, Jerzy Bonczak. Anything is possible in Warsaw rising from the war rubble in 1953. The omnipresent uncertainty, denunciations, and the sense of constant surveillance are tamed with the help of vodka and good company. A renowned writer, Mister T. lives in a hotel for authors and makes a living by giving extra lessons. One day, a young countryside man moves into the next-door flat with big dreams of working as a journalist. Mister T. becomes his mentor and teacher. The pace of the protagonist's life quickens once the authorities begin to suspect him of an evil wish to blow up the Palace of Culture and Science, and Secret Police agents start to watch every move he makes. Chocolate Road
Słodka droga do czekolady
programme.desc: Directed by Tanya Chuturkova. With Frances Louise Bekele, Joe Cullen Brown, Martin Christy, Elvin Ovidio Ávila Flores. Three renowned chocolatiers - Maribel Lieberman, Susumu Koyama and Mikkel Friis-Holm - take us through the process of craft chocolate-making all the way from the tree to the final chocolate piece. On their journey, each of them finds how important it is to know the roots of their primer material - the cacao bean, and how they can highly impact the lives of the people involved in the chocolate ...

Kiler-ów 2-óch
programme.desc: Kilerów 2-óch: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Cezary Pazura, Malgorzata Kozuchowska, Janusz Rewinski, Jan Englert. Jurek Kiler (see the prequel to this movie, "Kiler") has become a VIP - sponsoring the Polish government, playing tennis with the President, and stuff. He must oversee a transfer of a substantial amount of gold. However, in his past activities, he has made enemies. Mighty ones. And thus Jurek Kiler's next adventure begins as he has to face attempts at kidnapping, assassinations, and problems in his love life..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0190506/","name":"Kilerów 2-óch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjNiZjNmNDItYzcwNS00NDc0LTlhYjEtNGNmZGFhYmJkMzFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0668640/","name":"Cezary Pazura"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0469021/","name":"Malgorzata Kozuchowska"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0720969/","name":"Janusz Rewinski"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953686/","name":"Ryszard Zatorski"}],"datePublished":"1999-01-15","description":"Jurek Kiler (see the prequel to this movie, "Kiler") has become a VIP - sponsoring the Polish government, playing tennis with the President, and stuff. He must oversee a transfer of a substantial amount of gold. However, in his past ","keywords":"sequel,second part,character name in title","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0190506/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"zmigy"},"dateCreated":"2000-04-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A great sequel to a good film","reviewBody":"Though some might disagree, I think "Kilerow Dwoch" (Two Killers), a Polish made action comedy making fun of all big-budget Hollywood action films, is even more hilarious than the previous "Kiler" of 1997. This sequel has everything that a viewer could ask for. More action, more "laugh-so-hard-you-fall-of-the-seat" comedy, and even as the title already mentions, two killers!! I did have my doubts about it being as good as the first film when I saw it in the cinema first time around. But after watching it a few more times on video (as I now own it as well), I was convinced that Juliusz Machulski made a very worthy sequel which in a lot of aspects actually surpasses the original."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3741,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"duration":"PT2H7M"}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Billy Campbell, Karine Vanasse, Glen Gould
Billy Campbell, Karine Vanasse, Glen Gould

programme.title: 60 kilo niczego
programme.desc: Zimny poranek w odkrywkowej kopalni kruszców. Krzysztof (Grzegorz Damięcki) zaczyna pierwszy dzień pracy na stanowisku kierownika. Wyraźnie nie pasuje on do środowiska pracowników fizycznych. W trosce o własną pozycję, zamierza trzymać dyscyplinę twardą ręką. Nagły wypadek, którego ofiarą staje się jeden z ukraińskich robotników, wystawia zasady moralne Krzysztofa na próbę. Zdaje on sobie sprawę z tego, że łatwo być stanowczym tylko w sprzyjających okolicznościach. Jednak trudno mu przeciwstawić się złu, kiedy w grę wchodzą dramatyczne konsekwencje.

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damięcki
Artem Manuilov
Andrzej Grabowski

programme.title: Spitsbergen
programme.desc: Magda (Magdalena Czerwińska), zawieszona ratowniczka medyczna, otrzymuje nagłe wezwanie. Oznacza to dla niej powrót do dramatycznych wydarzeń i ludzkich tragedii. Gdy opada poziom adrenaliny, kobieta przypomina sobie podróże na Spitsbergen - mroźną norweską wyspę na Morzu Arktycznym. To miejsce stało się dla niej powodem traumy, z którą do tej pory nie zdołała się uporać. Przerastają ją cudze nieszczęścia i własna przeszłość.

credits.actor: Magdalena Czerwińska
Marek Kossakowski
Marian Dziędziel

programme.title: Acid Rain
programme.desc: Młoda ucieka z domu jak najdalej od smutnej, bezbarwnej miejscowości. Szybko okazuje się, że podróż autostopem nie jest tak ekscytująca, jak się wydawało, kiedy znajduje się w środku nocy na obrzeżach postkomunistycznego miasta. Dziewczyna dostrzega na moście postać, która niebezpiecznie balansuje na barierce. Tak poznaje niezrównoważonego dziwaka Chudego. Oboje postanawiają na jakiś czas obrać taki sam kierunek podróży. Pod osłoną nocy snują się po mieście, w coraz dziwniejsze rejony, doświadczając niezwykłych emocji. Wkrótce między Młodą a Chudym tworzy się nienazwana więź. Całość oparta jest na płaszczyźnie psychodelicznej jak z narkotycznego transu.

programme.title: Wiki
programme.desc: Autystyczna Wiki (Kamila Kobic) jest ciekawa świata. Musi zmierzyć się z trudną rzeczywistością. Pewnego dnia spotyka Mateusza (Adam Bobik), fana autobusów warszawskiej komunikacji miejskiej, który wprowadza radość do jej szarego życia.

credits.actor: Kamila Kobic
Magdalena Kizinkiewicz
Adam Bobik

He learns more and more about the mysteries of this murder, revealing corruption and fraud among local elites.","keywords":"school","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6281238/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"getmeplants","dateCreated":"2019-08-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A gripping Polish thriller that stands up against the best Nordic Noir","reviewBody":"AKA The Teacher on Channel 4's Walter Presents This is among the best of those series that fall into the category of Nordic Noir (though Poland obviously isnt Nordic!) After the body of a local student is found in a forest, the police discover that she was murdered. A new teacher Pawel Zawadzki arrives at her school, but his reason for leaving his city job is unclear. From there develops a wonderful plot that encompasses local corruption, drug dealing and the overlapping worlds of students and adults, linked up by the desire of Pawel to discover the truth behind the girl's death. It is hard to describe in too much detail why this wonderfully shot and atmospheric thriller is so gripping, without giving too much away. Yet I hope I can persuade you to give this a go. I rarely waqtch TV, as so much of it is tripe, let alone be drawn into something so compelling that I would have happily binge watched this series. If you have enjoyed the Bridge (Bron/Broen)or the Lawyer (Advokaten), you will gripped by this intriguing, well written and superbly cast thriller","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1457,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mrówka wychodzi za mąż
programme.desc: Mrówka należy do nowej generacji europejskich kobiet i jest typową jej przedstawicielką. programme.title: Czempion
programme.desc: Marian (Marek Siudym), starzejący się mistrz kolarstwa, pracuje jako stróż na złomowisku samochodów. Przytłacza go samotne życie na odludziu. Ulega pokusie i podejmuje próbę zmiany swojej sytuacji. Okazuje się jednak, że nie jest to łatwe w nieznanym mu wirtualnym świecie, rzeczywistości selfie czy miłości na sprzedaż.

programme.title: Potwory to tacy interesujący ludzie
programme.desc: Czy będąc samemu w domu czujesz się bezpiecznie? A co, jeśli ktoś Cię podgląda? Mroczny i minimalistyczny thriller, w którym reżyser bawi się formą. Opis fabuły tajemniczego projektu jest niedostępny na życzenie autora. Film zdobył wyróżnienie na Festiwalu Kina Niezależnego CK OFF w Przemyślu.

programme.title: Tata
programme.desc: Członkowie dwupokoleniowej rodziny próbują żyć ze świadomością o jej rozpadzie. Niektórzy starają się to akceptować i trwać w takiej rzeczywistości, a inni chcą się z niej wydostać. Liczne problemy, rozpadające się związki i rozwody negatywnie wpływają na stosunki międzyludzkie. Wszystko to odbija się na dzieciach, które w ten sposób tracą szansę na normalny rozwój. Przedstawiana historia widziana jest z perspektywy małego dziecka, obserwującego zachowania swoich rodziców. Rozgrywający się dramat ojca Janusza (Grzegorz Juchiewicz) uwidacznia bezsilność w bezwiednie zapoczątkowanej autodestrukcji.

programme.title: L'ordre des médecins
Zawód: Lekarz
programme.desc:
L'ordre des médecins: Directed by David Roux. With Jérémie Renier, Marthe Keller, Zita Hanrot, Maud Wyler. At the age of 37, Simon is a seasoned doctor, who works with death every day in his department of pneumology. As a good professional, he learned to protect himself. But when her mother is hospitalized in critical condition in a nearby service, the intimate and the professional telescope. All of Simon's world, all his certainties and beliefs are flickering." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8886110/","name":"L'ordre des médecins","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTVjOTVlNjktZWRjOS00MmQyLTgwYjgtZDUyZTQ2M2MwNDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc5OTQwMzk@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0753737/","name":"Jérémie Renier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445715/","name":"Marthe Keller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1581208/","name":"Zita Hanrot"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746196/","name":"David Roux"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0342973/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0482351/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0244390/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1701553/","name":"Julie Peyr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746196/","name":"David Roux"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1026538009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDc3ZjllMWYtOTFlZi00YTA2LWE2YjctZDI4ZmUwNjU5YWQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDc3ZjllMWYtOTFlZi00YTA2LWE2YjctZDI4ZmUwNjU5YWQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"datePublished":"2019-01-23","description":"At the age of 37, Simon is a seasoned doctor, who works with death every day in his department of pneumology. As a good professional, he learned to protect himself. But when her mother is hospitalized in critical condition in a nearb","keywords":"doctor,hospital,death,radiography,telephone call","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8886110/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dbdumonteil"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"My mummy is gonna die......","reviewBody":"If there is still any doubt that Mr Jérémie Rénier is one of the European 's greatest actors , see "l'Ordre Des Médecins ", a first effort by Mr David Roux , a masterstoke ;taking a subject as old as the hills (a mother dying in a hospital where his son is a seasoned lung specialist ) ,Roux avoids sentimentalism and pathos ,achieving a delicate balance between an almost documentary approach and an unusually human compassion ; many scenes come to mind : after the end (not shown on the screen) ,father and son desperately embrace each other in a dark room;the terminally-ill mom,saying her life has been a fullfilled one and that she can go;her last words spoken could be "all is well ,all is peace" ;the sequence when the whole family savors ice-creams in the garden echoes it ("isn't lemon taste wonderful,mom? and just have a taste of apricot") the young doctor, bursting into tears after saving a patient .

Jeremie Rénier,since his breakthrough with Ozon's disturbing "Les Amants Criminels" (1999),has proved he was able to play anything: from the last ,lonely and wretched guy ("L'Enfant" by the Dardenne bros ) to a pop singer ("Clo-Clo" )to self-assured lung specialist facing a situation which undermines the fondations of his world;a world which is not rosy every day : the scene in which Rénier took my breath away is when he scolds a young intern who has just said to a young patient suffering from mucovisdicosis that they would save her : and in spite of his ruthless words ,Rénier achieves the incredible feat of remaining endearing to the audience .

Matching him every step of the way is Marthe Keller's portrayal of a dying mother ;co-incidentally ,miss Keller had ,some forty years ago ,portrayed a terminally-ill woman opposite Al Pacino in "Bobby Deefield";she shows here that, unlike some her colleagues lost in the current "feel good" French scene,she can age gracefully.;spare of words and gestures ,she expresses everything with her looks.

But whereas the patient remains resigned to her fate, the husband does not accept it: "I'm fifteen years her senior,I should have gone first!" or " I 'd like best your mom to be in your service ,I'd be easier in my mind ";terse answer by the son: "it wouldn't make a difference".

And much to Roux' s credit ,no song in English ,as it is often the case with his "trendy " colleagues. Joe Dassin' s "C'Est La Vie Lily " provides the movie with one of his rare playful moments; "Donne-Moi La Main" is the equivalent of the poster ,the man with bright prospects who for the first time in his career needs a helping hand and who feels helpless and lonely in his tragedy .

Yes ,Mister Roux will be a name to be reckoned with,in the years to come.I would highly recommend this work,but only for people with a strong heart.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":226,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wolne pokoje
programme.desc: Historia Zosi (Weronika Wachowska), która pod przymusem matki przyjeżdża na wakacje do starego, rodzinnego młyna, gdzie ma się nią opiekować ciotka Krysia (Olga Miłaszewska). Krewna jest dla dziewczynki niemiła, a okolica wydaje jej się przerażająca. Pewnego dnia przyjezdna wraz z nowym kolegą odkrywa tajemnicze drzwi, które są zamknięte od lat i pod żadnym pozorem nie wolno ich otwierać. Dzieci postanawiają złamać zasadę i sprawdzić, co się za nimi kryje. Obraz nakręcono w Barlinku.

it this evening at the Merrill Lynch Conference","reviewBody":"I saw an advanced screening of Stranger than Fiction tonight on the Sony lot, as part of the Merrill Lynch media conference being held this week in Pasadena, CA.

I hadn't heard much about this movie prior to seeing it tonight, so I had NO expectations, which is really how I like to see a movie (without any preconceived notions, good or bad).

The movie was very well acted, and told an interesting story. I kind of look at Will Ferrell in this movie the way I looked at Adam Sandler after "Punch Drunk Love". You're not sure how to react to Ferrell/Sandler's on-screen persona's, as up to this point, you've always thought of them as the funny men, who couldn't (or wouldn't) attempt a more dramatic role. For Ferrell, who's probably at the height of his popularity, this was a good move for him, as well as an ideal role.

All in all, I really liked this movie, and I would definitely recommend it to friends/family."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":221367,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

it this evening at the Merrill Lynch Conference","reviewBody":"I saw an advanced screening of Stranger than Fiction tonight on the Sony lot, as part of the Merrill Lynch media conference being held this week in Pasadena, CA.

I hadn't heard much about this movie prior to seeing it tonight, so I had NO expectations, which is really how I like to see a movie (without any preconceived notions, good or bad).

The movie was very well acted, and told an interesting story. I kind of look at Will Ferrell in this movie the way I looked at Adam Sandler after "Punch Drunk Love". You're not sure how to react to Ferrell/Sandler's on-screen persona's, as up to this point, you've always thought of them as the funny men, who couldn't (or wouldn't) attempt a more dramatic role. For Ferrell, who's probably at the height of his popularity, this was a good move for him, as well as an ideal role.

All in all, I really liked this movie, and I would definitely recommend it to friends/family.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":221367,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"duration":"PT1H53M"</script><metacontent="

Instead of a homecoming, Tom finds himself suspected of committing the murders, and it seems like his old fla","keywords":"masked killer,valentine's day,mining town,dual identity,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1179891/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JoeKarlosi"},"dateCreated":"2009-01-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"My Bloody Valentine 3-D (2009) ***","reviewBody":"Remake of the 1981 slasher film about a maniac in a coal miner's outfit slaughtering everyone, and a worthy retread of the original. These days there has been a return of sorts to the unrestrained gory days of early '80s slasher films, and this one delivers in all those typical categories you'd expect -- the over-the-top mutilations and gore sequences, the gratuitous sex (including full frontal female nudity) and people getting theirs in a variety of inventive ways. At least it's a step up in that the main cast and victims are not just silly teenagers, but rather silly 20-somethings and older this time out. And it is a very nice bonus getting a return from old timer Tom Atkins as a retired policeman in the mix, too.\n\nThis film is also released in standard flat 2-D, but I would only have awarded it **1/2, if not for the added gimmick of third dimension, which is really what the fun is all about here. The 3-D effects are well done, seeing things fly off the screen and into your face. One wonders whether they might have taken this even farther with more deliberate situations designed to fully utilize the effect, but what's there is still cool. The "mystery" of the film kept me going back and forth in my guesstimates, up to the final second, so that was an added bonus to the usual trappings that worked for me. *** out of ****","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54365,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

Instead of a homecoming, Tom finds himself suspected of committing the murders, and it seems like his old fla","keywords":"masked killer,valentine's day,mining town,dual identity,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1179891/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"JoeKarlosi","dateCreated":"2009-01-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"My Bloody Valentine 3-D (2009) ***","reviewBody":"Remake of the 1981 slasher film about a maniac in a coal miner's outfit slaughtering everyone, and a worthy retread of the original. These days there has been a return of sorts to the unrestrained gory days of early '80s slasher films, and this one delivers in all those typical categories you'd expect -- the over-the-top mutilations and gore sequences, the gratuitous sex (including full frontal female nudity) and people getting theirs in a variety of inventive ways. At least it's a step up in that the main cast and victims are not just silly teenagers, but rather silly 20-somethings and older this time out. And it is a very nice bonus getting a return from old timer Tom Atkins as a retired policeman in the mix, too.\n\nThis film is also released in standard flat 2-D, but I would only have awarded it **1/2, if not for the added gimmick of third dimension, which is really what the fun is all about here. The 3-D effects are well done, seeing things fly off the screen and into your face. One wonders whether they might have taken this even farther with more deliberate situations designed to fully utilize the effect, but what's there is still cool. The "mystery" of the film kept me going back and forth in my guesstimates, up to the final second, so that was an added bonus to the usual trappings that worked for me. *** out of ****","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54365,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4,"duration":"PT1H41M"</script><metacontent="

nudity","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1320304/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bluestemz"},"dateCreated":"2010-11-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Resident Evil meets Aliens meets 30 Days of Night","reviewBody":"Unlike the original, which relied on a tense, cunning, isolated, claustrophobic atmosphere which threw me back to that feeling of hopelessness conveyed in John Carpenter's The Thing, this shoot 'em up sequel focuses more on strobe lighting, gun play, and pop out scares to convey it's tone. The acting is on par with a STV sequel, but I won't even begin to touch upon the scripts many weaknesses. The many shaky cam shots running down dark corridors could have been lifted out of The Blair Witch Project. The trigger happy heroine in this sequel could have been lifted straight from the Resident Evil franchise. All-in-all not a bad vampire movie on it's own, but not a great one either. Worth a rent in the genre for you could do much worse, but if you are a fan of the original and expecting more of the same ... well, drop all expectations and wipe your brain blank once you press play.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12595,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.4},"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Carnage Park
Park makabry
programme.desc: Carnage Park: Directed by Mickey Keating. With Ashley Bell, Pat Healy, James Landry Hébert, Michael Villar. Part crime caper gone awry, part survival horror film, this 1970s set thriller depicts a harrowing fight for survival after a pair of wannabe crooks botch a bank heist and flee into the desert, where they inexplicably stumble upon Carnage Park, a remote stretch of wilderness occupied by a psychotic ex-military sniper." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4335650/","name":"Carnage Park","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MTA2MTQ0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzkxNTAwOTE@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Crime","Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068042/","name":"Ashley Bell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372366/","name":"Pat Healy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2566469/","name":"James Landry Hébert"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4806266/","name":"Mickey Keating"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0497026/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4806266/","name":"Mickey Keating"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1236514585","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0NDY0MDI2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3ODIyOTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0NDY0MDI2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3ODIyOTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"It's 1978 and a bank robbery gone wrong leaves Vivian the hostage of two criminals on the run. But things go from bad to off-the-rails berserk when she and her captors wind up on the sun-baked desert outpost of a deranged ex-military sniper, who ensnares them in his deadly game of cat and mouse."},"datePublished":"2016-07-01","description":"Part crime caper gone awry, part survival horror film, this 1970s set thriller depicts a harrowing fight for survival after a pair of wannabe crooks botch a bank heist and flee into the desert, where they inexplicably stumble upon Ca","keywords":"survival,game of death,escape,psychopath,psycho killer","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4335650/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"matdog321"},"dateCreated":"2016-07-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Doesn't deserve this low rating","reviewBody":"Carnage Park is one of those thrillers that will probably disgust the regular audience, but will leave horror buffs completely unbothered. As soon as this film started I knew it was one of the good ones. This movie is balls to the wall suspense.The crazy flashing images were just a plus. Ashley Bell is a fantastic actress, Im not one to study movement or expressions but she really shined through in a movie that really just is a typical game of Cat & Mouse. The formula has been done before, but it works for me because of its stylish feel. I appreciate some of the shots of the film, such as a ditch being in the middle of our focus from birds eye view, and our main actress walking around it. The acting from the others are a bit cringe worthy but despite them the suspense and tension still never wears off. I went into this with high expectations (expecting a popcorn type of thriller of course,) and for the most part it was worth while. Check it out when it comes to Redbox or possibly Netflix.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3314,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Desolation Canyon
Kanion osamotnienia
programme.desc:
Desolation Canyon: Directed by David S. Cass Sr.. With Stacy Keach, Patrick Duffy, Kenny Johnson, Kelly Overton. Following a bank robbery, the responsible gang stops by the home of one of their members and kidnaps his son. The sheriff enlists the aid of a retired gunfighter, who is the boy's grandfather. On the gang's trail, they find there are two bounty hunters also after the gang for crimes in Mexico. Contains gun play." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0463959/","name":"Desolation Canyon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTc4MmExMTAtNzJhZC00NGFmLWJhNDgtOWRmNmE0ZjI5NWYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM3MDMyMDQ@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Western"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005078/","name":"Stacy Keach"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001155/","name":"Patrick Duffy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425543/","name":"Kenny Johnson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003180/","name":"David S. Cass Sr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069955/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090375/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045255/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1170443/","name":"Dan Fitzsimons"}],"description":"Following a bank robbery, the responsible gang stops by the home of one of their members and kidnaps his son. The sheriff enlists the aid of a retired gunfighter, who is the boy's grandfather. On the gang's trail, they find there are","keywords":"bounty hunter,bank robbery,posse,dynamite,abduction","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0463959/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bkoganbing"},"dateCreated":"2008-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Robbery And Kidnapping","reviewBody":"Desolation Canyon is a western that takes some of the themes from the John Wayne classic Big Jake and develops them a bit further. In fact it's quite the family tangle for Stacy Keach who essentially plays the Duke character and admirably fills his boots.

Some outlaws come to the town where Patrick Duffy is the sheriff and his old partner Stacy Keach lives in retirement and raising his two grandkids. The outlaws include his son who is the father of the grand children and on the way out of town grab the boy Drake Johnston. 

The boy's mother Kelly Overton is divorced from the son Victor Browne and she's keeping company with David Rees Snell the town banker who is nearly killed in the robbery. He's an Easterner and insists accompanying Duffy and Keach. 

In fact when the final showdown comes it's almost a relief because for what should be a straightforward story, the plot has an incredible amount of twists and turns. There are a couple of bounty hunters also on the trail with their own agenda, the outlaws have one aside from the robbery, it's all a bit hard to follow.

Still the players do very well in an extremely and needlessly convoluted story.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":319,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"duration":"PT1H20M"}</script><metacontent="

On the gang's trail, they find there are","keywords":"bounty hunter,bank robbery,posse,dynamite,abduction","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0463959/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"bkoganbing","dateCreated":"2008-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Robbery And Kidnapping","reviewBody":"Desolation Canyon is a western that takes some of the themes from the John Wayne classic Big Jake and develops them a bit further. In fact it's quite the family tangle for Stacy Keach who essentially plays the Duke character and admirably fills his boots.

Some outlaws come to the town where Patrick Duffy is the sheriff and his old partner Stacy Keach lives in retirement and raising his two grandkids. The outlaws include his son who is the father of the grand children and on the way out of town grab the boy Drake Johnston. 

The boy's mother Kelly Overton is divorced from the son Victor Browne and she's keeping company with David Rees Snell the town banker who is nearly killed in the robbery. He's an Easterner and insists accompanying Duffy and Keach. 

In fact when the final showdown comes it's almost a relief because for what should be a straightforward story, the plot has an incredible amount of twists and turns. There are a couple of bounty hunters also on the trail with their own agenda, the outlaws have one aside from the robbery, it's all a bit hard to follow.

Still the players do very well in an extremely and needlessly convoluted story.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":319,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5,"duration":"PT1H20M"</script><metacontent="

school,athlete,team","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1293842/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sdrawdedivadnairb"},"dateCreated":"2011-07-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"More than just another basketball movie.","reviewBody":"Every element comes together very well in this film give you much more than you'd expect from just another sports movie. Though it has a very "bad news bears" feel to it, the coach has real issues, but you don't really blame him for the problems he has. He ends up being more than just a coach to the girls, but a mentor and friend. 

The acting all blends together well, and make the characters seem real with a scrip written with today's teenagers in mind. Even the soundtrack and graphic elements are a great edition and gives really brings it together. 

I could normally care less about girl's basketball, but this movie will help you see there is more to this sport than just basketball. The winning season will captivate you and make you care about the characters and wish it was based on a true story."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6351,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Nieśmiały dwunastolatek Alan Parrish znajduje skrzynkę, we wnętrzu której ukryta jest niezwykła gra planszową "Jumanji". Chłopiec opowiada o tajemniczym odkryciu swojej jedynej przyjaciółce, Sarah Whittle. Podczas nieobecności opiekunów obydwoje rozpoczynają zabawę. Wtedy dochodzi do nieprzewidzianych zdarzeń. Nagle w pokoju pojawiają się nietoperze, a chłopiec zostaje wessany przez grę i znika. Przerażona dziewczynka ucieka. Mija 26 lat. Grę odnajduje rodzeństwo - Judy (Kirsten Dunst) i Peter (Bradley Pierce). Gdy tylko rzucają kostką, w domu pojawia się dorosły Alan (Robin Williams). Postanawia on odszukać swoją przyjaciółkę z dzieciństwa, Sarah (Bonnie Hunt). Niestety, okazuje się, że za mężczyzną przybyły groźne zwierzęta i okrutny myśliwy. By odesłać ich z powrotem, trzeba dokończyć śmiertelnie niebezpieczną rozgrywkę. Saturn za najlepsze efekty specjalne i dla Bonnie Hunt - najlepszej aktorki drugoplanowej oraz nominacja do tej nagrody dla małej Kirsten Dunst.

credits.actor: Robin Williams

hero","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0330793/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"grizzleyturn"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"vigilante-style justice done right","reviewBody":"If you like the old Clint Eastwood & Charles Bronson revenge movies then you'll like this film. Great pace and action that's gritty but extremely enjoyable. I can't say I knew anything about this Punisher character before seeing this film but I thoroughly enjoyed it none-the-less.\n\nThe Punisher is a shining example of revenge and vigilante-style justice done right. It's also yet another comic book adaptation done properly. In fact, this may be the first time I wished we could give half-vaults, because it was just that good. In the compendium of comic movies, this falls just shy of the two X-Men movies, but it is right there with Spider-Man and easily surpasses Batman, Superman and The Hulk. The fact that it is an R-rated movie killed any possible chance of decent box-office numbers, but it was a necessary step to take, and the quality of the movie just makes up for it. Hopefully this was Thomas Jane's breakout role."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":151386,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs.","keywords":"goth girl,babe scientist,special agent,naval criminal investigative service,police procedural","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0364845/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"arizona-philm-phan"},"dateCreated":"2013-10-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horrible Story Writing","reviewBody":"These story lines USED to be about Naval personnel and the problems they encountered---with the NCIS Team helping resolve them.

Anymore, most of these programs are about the "personnel interactions" between team members. For example, Tony and Ziva: for weeks and weeks, he has been trying to get her back from Israel and get her to love him. This has become so tiresome...tiresome...tiresome.

And Gibbs storyline involving shooting down some of his own friends is to far out of his to-date character line that it is amost comical, to say the least.

Please, Writers, whatever you do, please get OFF this track. You are losing fans!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":122822,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7}}</script><metacontent="

"},"datePublished":"2015-06-19","description":"A father struggling with bipolar disorder tries to win back his wife by attempting to take full responsibility of their two young, spirited daughters, who don't make the overwhelming task any easier.","keywords":"crepe,machete,columbia university,rent controlled apartment,lithium","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1969062/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"christian94"},"dateCreated":"2014-10-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Infinitely Personal With Wide Appeal","reviewBody":"Maya Forbes writes and directs a personal story of bittersweet childhood living in livid conditions with her sister, mother and eccentric bipolar father. A landmark first feature that has enough laughs but loads of conflicting emotions.

Zoe Saldana is a strong presence with her loving/loathing/longing and everything in between character. The ideal mother of her time and circumstances and the wife a man would fight for.

Mark Ruffalo is at the centre of it all with his charming, childlike and exuberant portrayal. He masters the manic episodes, the frailty, the fears, the hopes, the joys and the underlying deep love for his wife and kids.

The kids, one played by Maya Forbes's own daughter, are really adorable and act at a very high calibre. Creative, funny, aware and awkwardly accepting their weird family antics with a touch of rebellion.

Ultimately most of the credit is due to Maya's inventing and passionate storytelling in its form, content, message and lasting meaning. A film that is very human and difficult, but finds glimpse of beauty in little things that we should all hold dear. 

An easy but complex crowd-pleaser with much meat and mastery for the critics and film aficionados.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":15378,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Man Up
Odważ się zdobyć faceta
programme.desc:
Man Up: Directed by Ben Palmer. With Lake Bell, Rory Kinnear, Ken Stott, Harriet Walter. A single woman takes the place of a stranger's blind date, which leads to her finding the perfect boyfriend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3064298/","name":"Man Up","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzODcxNDcxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODE1NjM4NTE@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1128572/","name":"Lake Bell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1239499/","name":"Rory Kinnear"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0832792/","name":"Ken Stott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1414582/","name":"Ben Palmer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0282780/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0413801/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2208729/","name":"Tess Morris"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4107972889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNDU1MDAwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI3OTg5NDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNDU1MDAwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI3OTg5NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Meet Nancy: 34, single (still), hung-over (again), and exhausted by the endless futile set ups foisted upon her by well-meaning but clueless friends. As she travels across London to toast another 10 years of her parent's blissfully happy marriage, 40 year old, freshly-hatched divorcee Jack mistakes her for his 24 year old blind date. In a moment of uncharacteristic optimism (or insanity?), Nancy decides to just go with it... What follows is a chaotic, unconventional, hilarious night neither of them will ever forget. There will be drinking, there will be home truths; there will be an old classmate with a long-standing crush and stalker tendencies. There will be lost divorce papers, lost hopes, competitive indoor sports and an epic venue-to-venue urban triathlon. Oh, and the small matter of Jack finding out that Nancy isnÂ’t actually his real blind date. "},"datePublished":"2015-05-29","description":"A single woman takes the place of a stranger's blind date, which leads to her finding the perfect boyfriend.","keywords":"blind date,single woman,stranger,one day,seduction","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3064298/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"carlarsmendes"},"dateCreated":"2015-09-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Quite a lovely one","reviewBody":"My advice? Watch it? nd don't watch the trailer, there is no need

I wasn't expecting a typical American comedy, since I usually appreciate Simon Pegg's work. But I wasn't expecting to enjoy it this much. It seemed to me like a romantic movie but realistic in many ways - Including the fact that the actors are not typically young and gorgeous from every angle - They are beautiful yes, in their own authentic way, much like their characters I think. 

And of course it's a cliché film in many ways, but still made me smile and laugh out loud many times. I will recommend to my friends who appreciate quality cinema. It's one of the good ones!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":49696,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades - and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0113497/","name":"Jumanji","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTk2ZmUwYmEtNTcwZS00YmMyLWFkYjMtNTRmZDA3YWExMjc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000245/","name":"Robin Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000379/","name":"Kirsten Dunst"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002653/","name":"Joe Johnston"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060719/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0378144/","name":"Jonathan Hensleigh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0852430/","name":"Greg Taylor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0833164/","name":"Jim Strain"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Jumanji","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2677211417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ2Njc1MGUtNDYyYi00YTQxLTk0YTYtZjkzYWRhZTAyNWM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ2Njc1MGUtNDYyYi00YTQxLTk0YTYtZjkzYWRhZTAyNWM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"text os"},"datePublished":"1995-12-15","description":"When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades - and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.","keywords":"board game,adventurer,fight,game,year 1995","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0113497/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Newyorking"},"dateCreated":"2019-12-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Perfect for the entire family","reviewBody":"I decided to watch this movie with my 7 year old boys and absolutely loved it!! The movie is perfect for that age - suspense, thriller, kids, humor, and Robin Williams. I grew up watching him and miss him so much. He is amazing in the movie, and my boys really enjoyed watching it. I had purchased the game so surprised them with it after the movie and we had a fun game night. I highly recommend it for that age. The new Jumanji is geared more towards teenagers and adults with cheesy dialogues just to generate cheap laughs; this one is a classic. I wish they continued making these for kids, because the new ones are definitely not geared towards kids.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":315581,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="
